Title: Requires the commissioner of health to establish and publish a list of generic drug products; repealer
Summary: Requires the commissioner of health to establish and publish a list of generic drug products.
LawCode: Rpld §206 sub 1 ¶(o), add §280-d, Pub Health L; amd §§6810 & 6816-a, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the education law, in relation to generic drug products; and to repeal paragraph (o) of subdivision 1 of section 206 of the public health law relating thereto
